page.title: 13Nuseries/Garden Centres
page.content: There used to be lots of nurseries in Hawkwell like Potash, Rawal-Pindi and Spencers. Now there are only two, Potash and Rawal-Pindi.Rawal-Pindi is open all week.It sells, shrubs, trelis, bedding plants and wood. Rawal-Pindi is run by the family who live in a house nearby.They sell tomato plants. In one of the greenhouses they have 30 big tomato plants.When the tomato plants are fully grown they can not lift them.They can get 5-8lbs of tomatos off the plants.The plants are put on benches with holes in, which lets the air come through. They take the flowers off their Geraniums to make them grow better.They don't get many people in the winter because they don't have many plants. They have an old sheep. Rawal-Pindi has been there since the first world war.
